content:
I understand that the compiler doesn't build a full THIR and generates THIR on demand, but is it possible to dump full THIR of a program, for debugging purposes? I can't see anything relevant in -Zhelp.

I'm trying to see what refs, derefs etc. are generated during HIR->THIR conversions.
I'm not sure, but if it exists it's likely in -Z unpretty
